Posts.Content: I am stage iv breast cancer pt recently dx I was stage ii in 2008 4 wks ago they found it in my bilateral lungs.I thought I was free of breast cancer hell my hair grew to my shoulders last chemo was feb 2009 well my hair is falling out again I just finished my 3rd chemo abraxane and avastin for 6 months I can barely walk from pain in all my joints and of course many other things. A friend told me about his close friend that used fucoidan with very positive results wondered if any of you have heard bout this. Thanks
Posts.Title: anyone hear of alternative fucoidan
